text: Laurent Bernard Marie Ulrich (born 7 September 1951) is a French prelate of the Catholic Church. He became Archbishop of Paris in May 2022. Ulrich has been a bishop since 2000. He was Archbishop of Lille from 2008 to 2022. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:French Roman Catholic archbishops Category:People from Dijon
title: Laurent Ulrich
